title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo—CLI and Go library for pulling, running, and managing quantized Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with GPU/CPU inference.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client wrapping the Ollama REST API—chat, embed, pull, list, delete models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers—same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you swap Ollama models into any chain, agent, or retrieval pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting, model management, RAG uploads, multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and Android support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem exposing chat, generate, pull, and embed endpoints with native streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-dependent code without cloud keys.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, PDF RAG, fine-tune adapters, and edge deployment.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-gradio
summary: Minimal Gradio app that lets you upload documents and chat over them using Ollama embeddings + Chroma.

title: ollama-node
summary: Lightweight Node.js wrapper auto-generated from OpenAPI specs; zero native deps.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI with session memory, model selector, and token-speed metrics.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/await bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with chat, generate, and embed endpoints; includes Blazor sample.

title: ollama-docker-dev
summary: Dev-container setup with CUDA, ROCm, and CPU variants plus hot-reload Modelfile examples.

title: ollama-powershell
summary: PowerShell module wrapping the REST API—pipe models, chat, or generate straight from the shell.
